title: Mahinda Siriwardena made Sri Lanka Treasury Secretary
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – K M M Siriwardena, a central bank officials with fiscal experience has been appointed Treasury Secretary by President Gotabaya Rajapaksa, his office said in a statement.

Siriwardana was Deputy Central Bank Governo. He had also been a Director General of the Fiscal Policy Department and an Additional Director General of the National Planning Department at the Finance Ministry.
Retired Deputy Governor Nandalal Weerasinghe was also appointed Central Bank Governor.
He is an Advisory Board Member of the Centre for Applied Macroeconomic Analysis, Crawford School of Public Policy at the Australian National University.
